Why Walsall Families Choose LUXE VENUE

Walsall Event Challenge

Finding an affordable, elegant wedding venue in Walsall that offers halal catering, adequate parking, and modern facilities can be challenging. Many venues charge premium prices without delivering culturally sensitive service.

LUXE VENUE Solution

LUXE VENUE offers Walsall families a premium wedding venue with authentic Pakistani and Indian halal catering, flexible layouts, on-site parking, and transparent pricing. Perfect for Asian and Muslim community celebrations.

Frequently Asked Questions

How much does wedding venue cost in Walsall?

Wedding Venue hire at LUXE VENUE for Walsall clients starts from ¬£500-¬£900. Our packages include venue hire, basic d√©cor, LED lighting, A/V system, and optional halal catering from ¬£25pp.

What is the capacity for wedding venue in Walsall?

LUXE VENUE accommodates 20-70 guests comfortably for Walsall events. Our flexible layout can be configured for seated dining, standing reception, or mixed arrangements.

Do you provide halal catering for Walsall events?

Yes! We offer complete halal catering packages featuring authentic Pakistani and Indian cuisine for Walsall clients. All food is 100% halal certified with vegetarian and vegan options.

Is parking available for Walsall guests?

Yes, we provide on-site parking for up to 15 vehicles with additional street parking. Located 12 miles (20 minutes via M6) from Walsall, easily accessible for Walsall guests.

How do I book from Walsall?

We welcome Walsall clients to book free venue viewings 7 days a week. Contact us at +44 7391 222884 or use our online booking form.
